name: Paul_Klarrk
content:
Paul Klarrk was a male Zabrak Jedi who served the Jedi Order as a combat instructor during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Klarrk was dark-skinned with green eyes and black hair, wore brown and tan robes, and carried two lightsabers. Around 3638 BBY, Klarrk was stationed at the Avesta Plantation, a farming plantation owned by the Avesta family on the planet Makeb, during the Hutt Cartel's attempt to conquer the planet.
Paul Klarrk appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel, a 2013 Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare. Klarrk serves as the trainer for the Jedi Knight class on the planet Makeb, which was introduced in the expansion.
